== Kallelibhagom (CT) (628367) ==

Kallelibhagom (CT) is a town in the [[Karunagappally]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 8.95 sq. km. and harbouring 5477 households with total population of 21723 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 24 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 91 km. Male population is 10417 and female population is 11306. Scheduled Caste population is 2689 and Scheduled Tribes population is 51. Census Location Code of the town is 628367<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 24 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 91 km. Railway station is at Karunagappally at a distance of 2 km.
